defs._def: (offensive, idiomatic) Said to announce that a man is gay or effeminate.

extras: 2007, J. K. Rowling, Lya Wyler (trans.), Harry Potter e as Relíquias da Morte, Rocco, page 508:
O senhor realizou extraordinária magia com essa varinha.You have done extraordinary magic with that wand.

defs._def: catafalque (platform to display or convey a coffin)
third-person singular (ele and ela, also used with você and others) present indicative of ser
e (name of the letter E, e)
that’s right; yes; yeah; indicates agreement
erm; um; used in hesitant speech
(idiomatic, rhetorical question) How am I supposed to (face someone after I did)...?
extras: Eu não consegui realizar as minhas tarefas. Com que cara direi isso ao meu chefe?I've failed to do my assignments. How am I supposed to tell that to my boss? (Literally: "With what face will I tell that to my boss?)
